name: Home Painter - Fill Puzzle
description:
Want to find an amazing game to training your mind and calm down your mood?
Try this Home Painter!
Swipe the cube to solve the Maze Puzzle and Fill the sweet home with Bright Colors. You will love this painting puzzle game.
There are tons of funny puzzles here. Are you up for them? Fill every square to meet with more charmful paint puzzles.
Take a break and enjoy the wonderful game right now!
